item.description:
Come join us for this Gorgeous ride along the coast of beautiful Cape Ann.  We will enjoy delightfully varying views of harbors, light houses, beaches, and salt marshes as we ride through the towns of Gloucester and Rockport.  The Historic Cape Ann.   The ride starts at Stage Fort Park, in Gloucester.  It will cover Gloucester, Rockport and Annisquam.   We will stop for a break (for Ice Cream or any snacks you may have brought) about halfway through at a little park in the center of Rockport; bring your own or buy from places nearby.   Afterwards let's go out for a late lunch in Gloucester. 

We will try to keep our pace roughly at 12 to 15 mile pace.  Will stop on occasion to make sure we have the group together.  If there seems to be a large gap between speeds we my have someone take off and lead the faster riders.

There is free parking right at Stage Fort Park and bathrooms are across from the parking area.

Things to bring:  Water, Sun Tan lotion, Money for lunch and snacks.

This is not a ride for the super competitive as we do stop for everyone.  With that said we expect people to be able to ride 30 miles and be in reasonably good shape and to have good enough judgement to know if this is or is not a ride for you.

No requirement for a road bike but probably not appropriate for a mountain bike.

We may reschedule if raining.

For those that sign up for the ride I will email you cue sheets a few days before.  In the meantime I will be looking for a place for us to go for lunch afterwards.  IF anyone has suggestions that would be awesome.  Looking for a place reasonably priced and outdoor seating would be awesome.

Directions:

Take 128 N until you come to the traffic circle in Gloucester

Bear right heading to Gloucester (I believe that is Rte 127)

Take an immediate right into the TDBank Parking lot go to the right of the building

Head out back towards Friendly's

Park as far away from the businesses as possible so that their patrons can utilize the parking.

Again meeting time is at 10am Be ready to ride at 10:30 am.. The ride in reality is going to be about 28 miles we are cutting out a small section.

After the ride is over we will be heading to the Cape Anne Brew Pub for food and Libations.

My phone number if you need to get a hold of me is 781-856-2933..

Hopefully Rob will send out a message too with his phone number in case you have trouble

getting a hold of me.
